welcomeScreen.title: Play the soccer you want
welcomeScreen.appDescription:
Play soccer 7-a-side or futsal wherever you want, with whomever you want and at the level that best suits you.

Create your player to start playing friendly or competitive matches.

Create a club with a group of players and easily manage teams, matches, lineups, quotas, transfers and more.

registerScreen.title: Welcome again!
registerScreen.termsAndPrivacy: By creating this account, you are accepting our

loginScreen.title: Are you ready to play football whenever you want?

passwordScreen.title: Recover your password
passwordScreen.description: Introduce your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.

alert.title: Check your email
alert.message: We've sent you a link to reset your password.

onboardingScreen.title: Create player
onboardingScreen.introText:
Complete all the data in the 3 steps below to create your player profile. 

You will be able to edit these data from your profile once it has been created.
onboardingScreen.totalParametersInfo:
Phys. Fitness has been calculated with the data from the previous step and is not editable. 

You have 250 points to distribute among the remaining 5 parameters.
onboardingScreen.parametersExceededError: The sum of the values assigned to the 5 parameters cannot exceed 250.

onboardingPlayerOptions.title: Let's play {{name}}!
onboardingPlayerOptions.description:
You can now sign up for matches or create them independently (no club). You can also join a club or start a new club. 

If you are not going to be in a club at the moment, go to the home screen. These options will still be available.
onboardingPlayerOptions.joinClubDescription: Join a club and start participating in its meetings and activities.

joinClubModalTopics.1: Receive call-ups for matches and the notifications
joinClubModalTopics.2: Plays tournaments or friendly matches between clubs
joinClubModalTopics.3: Be a team captain or a club chairman
joinClubModalTopics.4: Participate in club and general rankings

onboardingPlayerOptions.createNewClubDescription: Create a club, invite friends, make call-ups, manage and play

createNewClubModalTopics.1: Manage teams, call-ups, notifications, transfers and more
createNewClubModalTopics.2: Hand over the presidency when you decide with the rest of the members
createNewClubModalTopics.3: Play tournaments or friendly matches between clubs
createNewClubModalTopics.5: Participate in club and general rankings

onboardingPlayerOptions.goToProfileDescription: Straight to the home screen. Create or join clubs later.

goToProfileModalTopics.1: Create friendly matches with other players
goToProfileModalTopics.2: Join a club or create it when you decide
goToProfileModalTopics.5: Offer yourself to teams as a reinforcement

error.generic: Something went wrong, please review your data or try again later.
error.requiredFieldNumberWithRange: {{field}} must be a number between {{min}} and {{max}} without decimals.
error.invalidMail: The email address is badly formatted
error.userNotFound: There is no user with this email or the password is incorrect

onboardingPlayerOptions.title: What would you like to do next?
onboardingPlayerOptions.description:
You can now sign up for matches or create them independently (no club). You can also join a club or start a new club. 

If you are not going to join a club at the moment, go to your profile. These options will still be available.
onboardingPlayerOptions.joinClubDescription: Join a club and start participating in its match calls and activities.

joinClubModalTopics.2: Plays tournaments or friendly matches between clubs
joinClubModalTopics.4: Participate in the club and general rankings.

goToProfileModalTopics.1: Create friendly matches with other players
